entry.title: Climbing in Bishop
entry.content:
Climbing in Bishop

Went on a nine day climbing trip down to Bishop California with a bunch of climbing folk from Winnipeg.

I’ve never been specifically on a bouldering trip but turns out that just climbing with pads is pretty rad.

On the way back we took slight detour and checked out the Moab, UT area.

We got there at 3am and slept under the stairs. I woke up first.

Oh hey look at that boulder with the v15 and v16.

Chris is the king!

Tyler climbing “The Clapper” in the happy boulders.

Ray, Casey, Chris. My favourite people.

I also ran into Jesus out in the desert.

Arches National Park right outside of moab. Probably the coolest place I’ve been to so far.

We scrambled along some of those rock ridges.

entry.title: Treeplanting 2014 - Highlights
entry.content:
It was my second year of planting out in BC. Mostly around kamloops. Feeling fairly nostalgic about it right now although if I end up back there (as if it’s even a question) I’m probably going to hate most of it.

Here’s the gang. Left to right: Simon, Kiddo, Sara, Kent.

Another one on the same cutblock with the truck in frame.

Tosh looking like a wolf hanging out with me as I load up my bags with trees.

Cool panorama of, I believe, the last block we planted for the year.

Kiddo’s cold…

entry.title: A Dark Dark Hole
entry.content:
Most of my evenings are spent on these fucking ridiculous internet type tangents.

I start watching something funny and most likely it’s of a standup comedian. I’ll then wikipedia this individual, because I need to know how they became successful and exactly how many failed marriages they’ve had, usually much more interesting if the person is an actor. After I’ve fully absorbed their life via wiki for some reason I go off on one of those link it back to the jesus wikipedia page games.

Anyways, I’m stuck on Jim Gaffigan at the moment and his standup specials are great but he is exceptionally good on letterman and conan latenight shows.

But basically I started watching one of his specials and end up hours later looking at a professional photographers webpage that Gaffigan hired for one of his special cover shots. After watching like 4 hours of radio show interviews, small bits from late night tv, parts of other standup and his small roles in television.

Mostly I just wish I was spending my time on something a little more productive or at the very least a book.

Oh well.

entry.title: Allison is a loser
entry.content:
So Allison is my little sister.

Kinda dumb, but really cute.

That’s is it really. Not much else to say about it…

entry.title: POST Formatting
entry.content:
**Top of the Page**

SOmetimes I wonder why the world doesnt understand this isnt just me but you too.

Somtimes I feel like a loser and a loser isnt anything but a winner that didn’t win.

But often these paragraphs are really the winners of all of the shit. Often isn’t always easy you see. Why is that? Well easy is often as often is sometimes. And not usually is sometimes anything but, often.

Why is there life inside.

Why isn’t life all outside.
